FuncDef: This command configures the time for which the cache entry is kept if there is no corresponding DHCP DISCOVER. At the expiry of this time, the cache entry is deleted.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies, in hours, the timeout after which an entry in the cache will expire. Values-1.
Specifies, in minutes, the timeout after which an entry in the cache will expire. Values-1 to 59.
Specifies, in seconds, the timeout after which an entry in the cache will expire. Values-1 to 59.
